## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                          | Type                | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | --------- |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | Set what theme will be aplyed inside the component. 'light', 'dark'; | `"dark" \| "light"` | `'light'` |
